original_text: There the border will turn and it will go along the Stream of Egypt. It will continue as far as the Mediterranean Sea.
korean_text: 아스몬에서 돌아서 애굽 시내를 지나 바다까지 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: and it will go along the Stream of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 이집트 강을 따라 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as far as the Mediterranean Sea
